attributes.action: We propose that Iain Duncan Smith MP should live on £53/week for one month.
attributes.additional_details:
We propose that Iain Duncan Smith MP volunteer to live alone in rented social housing for one month. He will be given (after payment of rent, utilities, phone and tv bills) a maximum income of £53 per week for this period.
We ask that, following the exercise, Mr Duncan Smith publishes a monthly budget which details how the money was spent.
